task: Plan a carbon-neutral art-focused cultural exchange program in Kyoto, Japan, ensuring minimal environmental impact. Design a comprehensive itinerary that includes virtual and physical art workshops, zero-carbon transport options, energy-efficient accommodations, immersive cultural experiences, and sessions on sustainable art practices. Incorporate up-to-date weather insights, language support for non-Japanese speakers, and real-time carbon footprint tracking.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Primary interface between the user and the system, directing the organization of a carbon-neutral art-focused cultural exchange program.

agents.name: cultural_exchange_program_agent
agents.role: Oversees the planning and execution of the program, managing interactions with various specialized agents.

agents.name: accommodation_arranger_agent
agents.role: Arranges stays at energy-efficient and environmentally friendly accommodations.

agents.name: art_workshop_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Coordinates both virtual and physical art workshops with an emphasis on sustainable practices.

agents.name: sustainable_art_practice_agent
agents.role: Focuses on integrating sustainable practices into art workshops.

agents.name: hybrid_art_workshop_agent
agents.role: Enables access to workshops through both virtual and physical attendance options.

agents.name: zero_emission_transport_agent
agents.role: Plans routes and modes of transportation that result in zero emissions.

agents.name: route_planner_agent
agents.role: Develops detailed zero-emission travel routes.

agents.name: cultural_experience_designer_agent
agents.role: Designs immersive cultural experiences with a focus on environmental sustainability.

agents.name: eco_tourism_expert_agent
agents.role: Advises on eco-friendly tourism options and designs sustainable cultural tours.

agents.name: language_assistance_agent
agents.role: Provides translation and language support for non-Japanese speaking participants.

agents.name: carbon_tracking_agent
agents.role: Monitors and reports the carbon footprint of the entire program in real-time.

agents.name: weather_monitor_agent
agents.role: Tracks and advises on weather patterns throughout the program to aid planning.

agents.name: sustainability_awareness_agent
agents.role: Promotes sustainability practices and educates participants on reducing environmental impact.

agents.name: environmental_impact_reduction_agent
agents.role: Focuses on strategies to minimize the environmental impact of the program.

agents.name: feedback_management_agent
agents.role: Collects and processes feedback from participants to improve future programs.

agents.name: post_event_feedback_agent
agents.role: Engages with participants to gather detailed feedback post-event.

agents.name: community_engagement_agent
agents.role: Facilitates interactions with local communities for a more authentic cultural exchange.

agents.name: local_history_agent
agents.role: Provides historical context and information about Kyoto to enrich the cultural experience.

agents.name: local_artist_collaboration_agent
agents.role: Connects participants with local artists to foster creative collaborations.

agents.name: zero_waste_initiative_agent
agents.role: Ensures the program adheres to zero-waste principles.

tools.name: energy_efficient_hotel_tool
tools.description: Database of hotels employing energy-efficient technologies and practices.

location.description: City or area within Kyoto where accommodation is needed.

features.description: Desired eco-friendly features (e.g., solar power, water recycling).

tools.name: remote_access_tool
tools.description: Facilitates access to online art workshops, allowing virtual participation.

workshop_id.description: Unique identifier for the workshop session.

tools.name: sustainable_transport_tool
tools.description: Provides options for carbon-neutral transportation in Kyoto.

tools.name: sustainable_culture_tour_tool
tools.description: Curates cultural tours that emphasize sustainability in Kyoto.

theme.description: Theme or focus of the cultural tour.

tools.name: language_support_tool
tools.description: Offers language translation and support services.

number_of_participants.description: Number of participants needing translation services.

tools.name: real_time_carbon_tracking_tool
tools.description: Tracks the carbon emissions of the program in real-time.

activity_id.description: Identifier for the activity being monitored.

tools.name: kyoto_weather_tool
tools.description: Provides up-to-date weather forecasts and conditions in Kyoto.

date_range.description: List of dates for which weather forecasts are required.
